overview.header: Update your details without an account

applicant-details.p1: Enter the details of the person whose details you want to update. Their details must match the identity document that UK Visas and Immigration holds on record.

identity-number.p1: For security, you must provide us with information from an identity document that UK Visas and Immigration has on your clientâ€™s record.

check-answers.p1: Check these details carefully before continuing. If any of the details are incorrect, change them.
